trans-unit.source: Models a Category, which consists of a localized name and a collection of properties.
trans-unit.target: Modella una categoria, costituito da un nome localizzato e una raccolta di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The localized Category name of a group of properties.
trans-unit.target: Nome localizzato della categoria di un gruppo di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Sets a new property filter.
trans-unit.target: Imposta un nuovo filtro di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If the Category matches the specified filter, then the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se la categoria corrisponde al filtro specificato, il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> being applied.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"> </xref> viene applicato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the localized Category.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della categoria localizzata.

trans-unit.source: The localized Category name.
trans-unit.target: Nome localizzato della categoria.

trans-unit.source: Declares the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Dichiara il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns a property instance of this [System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object given the property name.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un'istanza della proprietà di questo [System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) oggetto dato il nome della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The string property name for which to return a property instance.
trans-unit.target: Nome della proprietà di stringa per il quale restituire un'istanza della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The property corresponding to the property name parameter if one exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà corrispondente al parametro di nome di proprietà, se esiste. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> matches a filter.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"> </xref> corrisponde a un filtro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a filter equals the specified filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un filtro è uguale al filtro specificato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches a predicate.
trans-unit.target: Indica se un <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> corrisponde a un predicato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"></xref>, a string, to match against.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"> </xref>, una stringa da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is a match; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è presente una corrispondenza. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied"></xref> event when the property filter is applied.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied"> </xref> evento quando viene applicato il filtro di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> being applied.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"> </xref> viene applicato.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.PropertyChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.PropertyChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that is changed.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà che è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: propertyName is .
trans-unit.target: propertyNameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets an [Systems.Collections.IEnumerable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) collection of all of the properties in the category.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un [Systems.Collections.IEnumerable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) raccolta di tutte le proprietà nella categoria.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, a collection of all the properties in the category.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, una raccolta di tutte le proprietà nella categoria.

trans-unit.source: Declares the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Design.PropertyEditing.INotifyPropertyChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Dichiara il <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Design.PropertyEditing.INotifyPropertyChanged>evento.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Design.PropertyEditing.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
